amendment.description: To provide that funds appropriated to the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection be used to enforce the provisions relating to textile transshipments provided for in the Customs Border Security Act of 2002, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3645 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3645 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9195) To provide that funds appropriated to the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection be used to enforce the provisions relating to textile transshipments provided for in the Customs Border Security Act of 2002, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3645 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3645 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Dole.
